name: Dream Solitaire
description:
Taking the author's absurd dream as the source of creation, it implies the author's helplessness, fear and embarrassment for life.

This small game of the programmer fully embodies the dilemma that a programmer will encounter, and presents it in a magical and bizarre way of expression; the game of the gnome is quite amazing and horrible, this may be The magical manifestation of struggle and fear in the author's dream.

The game content includes:

● 17 small games.

● 6 different ways to play.

● 4 paragraphs dealing with less serious "story".

Among them, the gnome represents the author's id, the otaku represents the author's ego, and the game player represents the author's superego.

And the 17-segment game is the conflict between the id、ego、superego.
